titleStmt.title: Grant Green to James F. Robinson
CWG8637

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p:
Auditor's Office, Kentucky,
Frankfort, 30th Jan, 1863
Hon J F Robinson, Esq.:
Govr &c
Dear Sir:

In the ^case of^ judgment of the Comth vs Henry Brown shff of Washinigton Co for a small balance due upon the revenue of said County for 1860. the full amount of the principal interest and costs has been paid -- The damages in the case amounts to $517.77/100 and I think should be remitted. The judgment was rendered at the February term 1861 of the Franklin Circuit Court --

Franklin Cir. Ct
$517.77 } Damages
Henry Brown
Sheriff
Washington Co
Remission Issd
Feby 3. 1863
